# GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/appInfoLocalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/appInfoLocalizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations)

-  GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/appInfoLocalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/appInfoLocalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/appInfoLocalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppInfoAppInfoLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appinfoappinfolocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#see-also)

### [Reading Localization Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-appInfoLocalizations#Reading-Localization-Information)

[`List All App Info Localizations for an App Info`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appinfos-_id_-appinfolocalizations)Get a list of localized, app-level information for an app.
